languages.text: "Истинный бог, грядущий сквозь Пустоту к нам, набожным детям. Вселенная полна ужасами и Ничем, и лишь Он один способен спасти нас! Но не вас, мерзкие еретики! Вы все обречены!"
"The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"
languages.original_text: "Истинный бог, грядущий сквозь Пустоту к нам, набожным детям. Вселенная полна ужасами и Ничем, и лишь Он один способен спасти нас! Но не вас, мерзкие еретики! Вы все обречены!"

traits.locale_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"
"The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"
"The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

"The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

languages.text: « Le véritable Dieu qui traverse le vide pour nous retrouver, nous, Ses enfants dévoués. L'univers est un abîme d'horreurs, et Lui seul peut nous sauver ! Mais pas vous, maudits hérétiques ! Vous êtes tous condamnés ! »
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

traits.locale_text: « Le véritable Dieu qui traverse le vide pour nous retrouver, nous, Ses enfants dévoués. L'univers est un abîme d'horreurs, et Lui seul peut nous sauver ! Mais pas vous, maudits hérétiques ! Vous êtes tous condamnés ! »

languages.text: «El auténtico dios que acude a nosotros, Sus hijos devotos, desde el vacío. El universo es un abismo de pesadilla, ¡y solo Él puede salvarnos! ¡Pero no a vosotros, viles herejes! ¡Estáis todos condenados!».
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

traits.locale_text: «El auténtico dios que acude a nosotros, Sus hijos devotos, desde el vacío. El universo es un abismo de pesadilla, ¡y solo Él puede salvarnos! ¡Pero no a vosotros, viles herejes! ¡Estáis todos condenados!».

languages.text: “祂是真神，祂穿过虚空，来到我们面前，拯救祂虔诚的子嗣。宇宙本身是个恐怖的深渊，只有祂能拯救我们！但祂不会拯救你们，你们这些邪恶的异端分子！你们难逃一死！”
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

traits.locale_text: “祂是真神，祂穿过虚空，来到我们面前，拯救祂虔诚的子嗣。宇宙本身是个恐怖的深渊，只有祂能拯救我们！但祂不会拯救你们，你们这些邪恶的异端分子！你们难逃一死！”

languages.text: 「敬虔な子供たちである私たちのもとへ、虚空を通してやってくる真の神。宇宙は恐怖の淵であり、彼だけが私たちを救うことができる！だが、下劣な異端者であるお前たちは違う！お前たちは破滅だ！」
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

traits.locale_text: 「敬虔な子供たちである私たちのもとへ、虚空を通してやってくる真の神。宇宙は恐怖の淵であり、彼だけが私たちを救うことができる！だが、下劣な異端者であるお前たちは違う！お前たちは破滅だ！」

languages.text: "Der wahre Gott, der durch die Leere zu uns kommt, zu seinen frommen Kindern. Das Universum ist ein Abgrund des Grauens, und nur er kann uns retten! Euch jedoch nicht, schändliche Ketzer! Ihr seid alle dem Untergang geweiht!"
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"

traits.locale_text: "Der wahre Gott, der durch die Leere zu uns kommt, zu seinen frommen Kindern. Das Universum ist ein Abgrund des Grauens, und nur er kann uns retten! Euch jedoch nicht, schändliche Ketzer! Ihr seid alle dem Untergang geweiht!"

languages.text: "Uçsuzdan geçip bize, kendini O'na adamış çocuklarına gelen gerçek tanrı. Evren, dehşetlerle dolu bir uçurumdur ve bizi yalnızca O kurtarabilir! Ama sizi değil aşağılık kâfirler! Sizin sonunuz belli!"
languages.original_text: "The true god who comes through the void to us, His devout children. The universe is an abyss of horrors, and only He can save us! But not you, vile heretics! You are all doomed!"
